name: ENK Mobile Medical Equipment
overview:
ENK Mobile Medical Equipment’s mission is to provide our consumers with a high qualilty of service and power mobility devices and healthcare equipment designed to address their needs and enhance their quality of life, while complying with all state and federal laws and the needs of the consumer.

The emphasis of our site is on Motorized Wheelchairs and Scooters AVAILABLE AT NO COST TO YOU IF YOU ARE ELIGIBLE. We come to you. Medicare assignment and private insurances are accepted. In addition, we are RESNA certified and offer a fine line of adult and pediatric Rehab Chairs.

In the meantime you can reach us at 1-800-693-8896 and by fax at 1-888-680-2966. We are looking forward to hearing from you. You can also contact us at our e-mail address: enkmedical@comcast.net.

“You may be eligible for a NEW chair if your current chair is over 5 years old.”

CALL TODAY TO SEE IF YOU OR SOMEONE YOU LOVE IS ELIGIBLE!

                                    1-800-693-8896

If you are not familiar with our company and your first contact with us is online: We would be pleased to hear from you! Please let us know what your needs and questions are, we will be more than happy to assist you.

In brief, you should know the following about us: our company was established in 2005 and has been responsible for providing outstanding Durable Medical Equipment products ever since. We are Medicare Accredited. Our specialty is in the area of Motorized Wheelchairs and Scooters. ENK’s regular customers particularly value our excellent customer service. Our business is located at 1039 Pittsburgh Street, Springdale, PA 15144.
